item.academy.magnetic_coil.desc:
Overcharges the developer
In order to rewrite personal reality
item.academy.app_freq_transmitter.s0_0: Please right-click a wireless matrix or node to start establish link from.
item.academy.app_freq_transmitter.s2_0: Right click any wireless node nearby to establish link. Click any other blocks to quit.
item.academy.app_freq_transmitter.s3_0: Right click any wireless receiver or generator nearby to esablish link. Click any other blocks to quit.
item.academy.app_freq_transmitter.e0: The wireless matrix is not initialized.
item.academy.app_freq_transmitter.e2: Link failed. Perhaps the matrix has reached its capacity or the signal is out of range.
item.academy.app_freq_transmitter.e3: Link failed. Perhaps the node has reached its capacity or the signal is out of range.
item.academy.media_sisters_noise.desc: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun S OP1
item.academy.factor_generic.brain_course: Undergo training for your brain. Increases Max CP by 1000.
Develop the thinking ability of your brain deeply. Increases Max CP by 1000 and Max Overload by 100.
Learn how to relax your brain better. Speed up CP recovery by 20%%.
item.academy.factor_electromaster.arc_ge: Arouse a weak electrical arc, which causes slight damage on the area it hits. If it directly hits a flammable block, it will have a chance to ignite it.
item.academy.factor_electromaster.mag_ma: Manipulate and move magnetizable things with the magnetic force, even throw them out to damage enemies.
item.academy.factor_electromaster.mine_d: Close your eyes and feel the flow of magnetism, allowing you to see a hint of precious mineral resources around you.
item.academy.factor_electromaster.railgu: Shoot the coin out at a high speed with electromagnetic induction. Cause destructive damage where it impacts.
item.academy.factor_electromaster.mag_mo: Generate a strong magenetic field and pull yourself towards some magnetic target. Extremely useful when moving or escaping.
item.academy.factor_electromaster.iron_s: Separate and manipulate the iron in sand to create a changeable and dangerous attack effect.
item.academy.factor_electromaster.chargi: Generate electric current to charge the thing in your hand or electric blocks in the world.
item.academy.factor_electromaster.body_i: Fine-tune your bioelectricity to improve your physical ability for a short duration.
item.academy.factor_electromaster.thunde: Manipulate the magnetic field in the atmosphere to create thunderclouds, and guide the electricity down to cause a devastating strike of lightning.
Compresses an enormous amount of electricity into a powerful bolt, bursting out and damaging anything in it's area.
item.academy.factor_teleporter.threateni: Teleport items to somewhere around you. Sometimes just a small fragment is able to kill an enemy.
item.academy.factor_teleporter.dim_foldi: Boost your damage against enemies by generating a tiny space folding phonemonon.
item.academy.factor_teleporter.penetrate: Derive the thickness of an obstacle in front of you, and teleport straight through it.
item.academy.factor_teleporter.mark_tele: Marks where you are looking at as the destination, and teleports you there.
item.academy.factor_teleporter.flesh_rip: Rip apart your enemy’s inside and inflict gory damage. The over-bloody effect may make you feel uncomfortable.
item.academy.factor_teleporter.location_: Memorize your current location and teleport back from anywhere far away afterwards.
Teleport a block about the means of the coordinate plane. The space-folding phonemonon will hurt any entity on the teleportation path.
item.academy.factor_teleporter.space_flu: Strengthen your space-folding ability to cause more dangerous critical damage.
Use multiple teleportations in a short time to maneuver through the air.
item.academy.factor_meltdowner.electron_: Pull together a small amount of electrons to generate a threatening beam.
item.academy.factor_meltdowner.rad_inten: Because of the high-intensity radiation, the target hit by beam is doubly vulnerable to attacks for a few seconds.
item.academy.factor_meltdowner.ray_barra: Shoot your high-energy ray at a Silicon Barn to scatter it into a ray barrage that destroys everything in front of you.
item.academy.factor_meltdowner.scatter_b: Manipulate more than one electronics group to attack. As a result, you can't control the impact point accurately.
item.academy.factor_meltdowner.meltdowne: Extreme high-energy electron beam that melts down walls and metals.
item.academy.factor_meltdowner.light_shi: Forms electrons into a shield. High-speed moving electrons will destroy anything that attack you, and damage anything touch you closely.
item.academy.factor_meltdowner.jet_engin: Use the propulsive force of electrons launch yourself into the air. Will generate a light-shield to protect yourself in the flight.
item.academy.factor_meltdowner.mine_ray_: After a long time of practice, you can make your electron beam suitable for harvesting minerals without destroying them.
With understanding of how to control the intensity of electrons better, you can now harvest mineral resources more efficiently.
After a long time of practice, you can almost harvest the useful resources in the ore perfectly.
item.academy.factor_meltdowner.electron_: Hold together a HUGE amount of electrons in a cloud and use some of it to attack each time.
item.academy.factor_vecmanip.dir_shock.d: Seize the counterforce when punched into object and redirect it onto the object itself, making the punch more powerful.
item.academy.factor_vecmanip.ground_shoc: Apply a powerful shock on the ground and direct it forward, which breaks the ground and launches enemies into the air.
item.academy.factor_vecmanip.vec_accel.d: Boost jumping force for an instant to accelerate yourself.
item.academy.factor_vecmanip.vec_deviati: Cancel the velocity of projectiles flying towards you, and cancels a portion of combat damage.
item.academy.factor_vecmanip.dir_blast.d: Triple the force of punching into the object, making it extremely destructive. Will break blocks on area it hits.
Manipulate the velocity of air to form four micro-whirlwinds at your back, and fly in high speed using forces they generate. Will break blocks nearby if inexperienced.
item.academy.factor_vecmanip.blood_retro: Stir the blood flow of organic enemies, making their vessel burst and die in extreme pain.
item.academy.factor_vecmanip.vec_reflect: Reflects the dangerous incoming attacks towards your line of sight, and make your opponent bear it.
item.academy.factor_vecmanip.plasma_cann: Manipulate a large area of air flow with extreme precision to form a plasma body. Throw it out to cause a disastrous explosion.
item.academy.factor_ac.ability_interf.ca: You can't use this interference block.
